クラス MiningNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Process
        • MiningNode
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class MiningNode
extends Process

    • ネストされたクラスの概要

      • クラスから継承されたネストされたクラス/インタフェース java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • フィールドの詳細

      • id

        int id
        The identifier of the process.

      • difficultyBits

        int difficultyBits
        The difficulty bits.

      • initialBlock

        Block initialBlock
        The initial block of the chain.

      • blockChain

        java.util.ArrayList<Block> blockChain
        The chain of blocks.

      • maxSize

        int maxSize
        The limit of the size of the blockchain.

      • debug

        boolean debug
        Debug output mode if it is true.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • MiningNode

        public MiningNode​(int id,
                  MessageQueue mq)
        The constructor of the class MiningNode.
        パラメータ:
        id - the process identifier.
        mq - the message queue for message passing.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • run

        public void run()
        The main procedure of the process.

        Process 0 creates a miner object and an initial block. Then, it broadcasts them to other nodes.

        定義:
        run インタフェース内 java.lang.Runnable
        オーバーライド:
        run クラス内 Process

      • broadcastMiner

        private void broadcastMiner​(int id,
                            Miner m)
        Broadcast a miner to every other node.
        パラメータ:
        id - the identifier of the source node.
        m - a miner object that is used for mining.

      • broadcastBlock

        private void broadcastBlock​(int id,
                            Block block)
        Broadcast a block to every other node.
        パラメータ:
        id - the identifier of the source node.
        block - a block that is created by the node.

      • receiveBlock

        private Block receiveBlock()
        Receive a block
        戻り値:
        Returns Block if the retruned value of receive() is not null.

      • checkHashValues

        private Result checkHashValues​(java.util.ArrayList<Result> results)
        Check obtained hash values are valid or not.
        パラメータ:
        results - a list of results that contain a hash value and a nonce.
        戻り値:
        Return Result if results contain a hash value that meets the criterion (Miner.isHit() returns true).

      • createBlock

        private Block createBlock​(Result r,
                          java.util.ArrayList<Block> bchain)
        Create a block from a given result.
        パラメータ:
        r - a result contains a hash value and a nonce.
        bchain - a chain of blocks.
        戻り値:
        Returns Block with Data, a hash value, a nonce, the previous hash value, the difficulty bits and a timestamp.

      • validateBlock

        private boolean validateBlock​(Block b)
        Validate the hash value of a received block.
        パラメータ:
        b - a block that has been received.
        戻り値:
        Returns boolean if the block meets the criterion (Miner.isHit() returns true).

      • addBlockToChain

        private void addBlockToChain​(Block block,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Block> bchain)
        Add a received block into the own chain.

        Whenever it adds a block to the blockchain, it should check the previous hash value is the same as the hash value of the latest block.

        パラメータ:
        block - a block that should be added to the blockchain.
        bchain - the chain of blocks in the node.

      • printChain

        private void printChain​(int id,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Block> chain)
        Print information of each block in a chain.
        パラメータ:
        id - the process identifier.
        chain - the blockchain of the process.

      • outputChain

        private void outputChain​(int id,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Block> chain)
        Output the own chain as a file in the csv format.
        パラメータ:
        id - the process identifier.
        chain - the blockchain of the process.

      • debugPrint

        private void debugPrint​(java.lang.String st)
        Debug output on a screen.
        パラメータ:
        st - an string that is appeared in the screen.
